actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: To provide for a study relating to the feasibility of using postal employees as census enumerators.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Directs the United States Postal Service to study and report to the appropriate congressional committees by January 1, 2012, on the feasibility of using postal employees to serve as enumerators in the 2020 decennial census.

titles.title: To provide for a study relating to the feasibility of using postal employees as census enumerators.
